Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pilosulin 5 (Myr b III; ants, insects, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Myrmecia banksi (Jack jumper ant) (Australian jumper ant)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Causes a significant and dose-dependent histamine release, probably by influencing the signal transduction of mast cells through a non-IgE-mediated pathway. This peptide does not have cytotoxic activities.

Literature.Title: Pilosulin 5, a novel histamine-releasing peptide of the Australian ant, Myrmecia pilosula (Jack Jumper Ant).
Literature.Author: Inagaki H, Akagi M, Imai HT, Taylor RW, Wiese MD, Davies NW, Kubo T.

Literature.Title: Proteomic analysis of Myrmecia pilosula (jack jumper) ant venom.
Literature.Author: Wiese MD, Chataway TK, Davies NW, Milne RW, Brown SG, Gai WP, Heddle RJ.
